title: [1.8+]【命令方块模组】【更新v5.0】探索玩家的福音——传送模组
author: awt2003
txt_content: 本帖最后由 awt2003 于 2017-6-16 21:52 编辑 中文名称:传送模组英文名称:Transmission module来源信息:原创软件版本:4.0.0适用版本:1.8+下载地址:http://pan.baidu.com/s/1pJ7UKEv    链接失效请告诉我原帖地址:本帖最后更新:2015-9-12 11:04编写语言:命令方块语言支持:简体中文安装方法:将代码导入命令方块后驱动即可是的，看过籽岷视频的同学都知道，籽岷安装了一个任意门模组，非常方便。 但是，如果你不想安装Forge怎么办？ 使用我的命令方块模组！ 注意事项：1.由于官方逼死命令方块，实体不能使用中文否则无法检测，传送蛋为英文，不过仔细查看物品的(lore)就可以分辨，不是抄袭。 2.设置家后再次设置家会清除原先的家，请注意！ 使用方法： 1.如果是生存请切创造/gamemode 1，局域网作弊打开，输入如下指令。获取一个命令方块。/give @p minecraft:command_block 1复制代码2.输入如下代码，使用红石激活。（下面可以复制） 代码： /summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Tile:152,Time:10,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~-37 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~2 ~-15 ~6 {Block:"minecraft:redstone_block",Time:1}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-15 ~10 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-14 ~10 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-13 ~9 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/tp @e[type=Bat,name=Sethome] ~ -999 ~"},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/tp @e[type=Bat,name=RandomTeleport] ~ -999 ~"},Riding:{}}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-12 ~9 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/tp @e[type=Bat,name=Teleport] ~ -999 ~"},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/execute @e[type=Bat,name=Sethome] ~ ~ ~ /tellraw @p {text:\\"\\",extra: [{text:\\"设置成功！\\",color:gold,bold:true}]}"},Riding:{}}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-11 ~8 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/execute @e[type=Bat,name=Teleport] ~ ~ ~ /tellraw @p {text:\\"\\",extra: [{text:\\"您已回家！\\",color:gold,bold:true}]}"},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/execute @e[type=Bat,name=Sethome] ~ ~-3 ~ /summon Bat ~ ~ ~ {ArmorItems:[0:{},1:{},2:{},3:{}],HandItems:[0:{},1:{}],LeftHanded:0b,ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,Amplifier:2,Duration:999999,ShowParticles:0b}],Invulnerable:1,CustomName:\\"Home\\",Silent:1,NoAI:1}"},Riding:{}}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-10 ~8 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/execute @e[type=Bat,name=RandomTeleport] ~ ~ ~ /tellraw @p {text:\\"\\",extra: [{text:\\"传送成功！\\",color:gold,bold:true}]}"},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/execute @e[type=Bat,name=Sethome] ~ ~ ~ /tp @e[type=Bat,name=Home] ~ -999 ~"},Riding:{}}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-9 ~7 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/execute @e[type=Bat,name=Teleport] ~ ~ ~ /tp @p ~ ~3 ~"},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/execute @e[type=Bat,name=RandomTeleport] ~ ~ ~ /spreadplayers ~ ~ 100 100000 false @p"},Riding:{}}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-8 ~7 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/execute @e[type=Bat,name=Teleport] ~ ~ ~ /tp @p @e[type=Bat,name=Home]"},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/execute @e[type=Bat,name=Sethome] ~ ~ ~ /tellraw @p  {text:\\"\\",extra:[{text:\\\"正在设置...\\",color:gold,bold:true}]}"},Riding:{}}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-7 ~6 @e[type=Bat,name=RandomTeleport] ~ ~ ~ /tellraw @p {text:\\"\\",extra: [{text:\\"正在传送...\\",color:gold,bold:true}]}"},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~1 ~1 ~ ~1 ~ {display:{Name:\\\\\\"Sethome\\\\\\"}}\\"}}",Text2:"",Text3:"",Text4:""}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~2 ~-2 ~4 wall_sign 1 replace {Text1:"{text:\\"获取随机传送蛋\\",color:black,bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"/give @p minecraft:spawn_egg 64 65 {display:{Name:\\\\\\"RandomTeleport\\\\\\"}}\\"}}",Text2:"",Text3:"",Text4:""}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~2 ~-2 ~4 wall_sign 1 replace {Text1:"{text:\\"获取回家蛋\\",color:black,bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"/give @p minecraft:spawn_egg 64 65 {display:{Name:\\\\\\"Teleport\\\\\\"}}\\"}}",Text2:"",Text3:"",Text4:""}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~1 ~-2 ~6 ~3 ~-1 ~10 air stained_glass 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~ ~11 quartz_block 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~2 ~2 ~4 wall_sign 1 replace {Text1:"{text:\\"移除传送模组\\",bold:True,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:True,color:gold,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~2 ~8 air\\"}}",Text2:"{text:\\"By awt\\",bold:True,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~2 ~8 air\\"}}",Text3:"{text:\\"\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~2 ~8 air\\"}}",Text4:"{text:\\"\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~2 ~8 air\\"}}"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/tellraw @a {text:"",extra:[{text:"戳我去Mcbbs支持作者",color:gold,bold:true,underlined:true,clickEvent:{action:open_url,value:"http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-486312-1-1.html"},hoverEvent:{action:show_text,value:\"[获得成就] 支持作者，支持Mcbbs，支持Minecraft！"}}]}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/title @a title {text:"",extra:[{text:"你好！模组已经安装成功！",color:yellow,bold:true}]}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/gamerule commandBlockOutput false"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/give @p minecraft:spawn_egg 64 65 {display:{Name:"Sethome",Lore: ["右键我设置家吧！"]}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/give @p minecraft:spawn_egg 64 65 {display:{Name:"Teleport",Lore:["右键我回家吧！"]}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/give @p minecraft:spawn_egg 64 65 {display:{Name:"RandomTeleport",Lore:["右键我传送吧！"]}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/kill @e[type=Chicken,name=Home]"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/kill @e[type=Bat,name=Sethome]"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/kill @e[type=Bat,name=Teleport]"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/kill @e[type=Bat,name=RandomTeleport]"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/tellraw @a {text:"",extra: [{text:"**************************",color:gold,bold:true}]}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/tellraw @a {text:"",extra:[{text:"最小距离：100，最大距离： 100000",color:gold,bold:true}]}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/tellraw @a {text:"",extra:[{text:"再次设置家会清除原先的家！",color:gold,bold:true}]}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/tellraw @a {text:"",extra:[{text:"更新了防生成蛋动物死亡功能！",color:gold,bold:true}]}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/tellraw @a {text:"",extra:[{text:"作者:awt",color:gold,bold:true}]}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/tellraw @a {text:"",extra:[{text:"欢迎使用随机传送模组 v4.0",color:gold,bold:true}]}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/tellraw @a {text:"",extra: [{text:"**************************",color:gold,bold:true}]}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~ ~ ~41 ~1 air"}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}复制代码3.此时模组已经加载！ 4.此时会自动给你一组"Teleport"和一组"Sethome"和一组"RandomTeleport"。5."Teleport"是指传送到你家。"Sethome"是指设置家。"RandomTeleport"是指随机传送。 6.如果需要设置家，请右键"Sethome"蛋。 7.如果需要回家，请右键"Teleport"蛋。 8.如果需要随机传送，请右键"RandomTeleport"蛋。 已经更新5.0! 2015/10/01大更新5.0 1.增加创造改进，创造额外给予切换模式蛋等 2.增加粒子效果（本来是4.0更新的，但是有bug） 3.将家的设置优化（已经优化，到家时无法破坏方块的问题已解决，改为了tp @p @e[type=Bat,name=Home]然后再tp @p ~ ~-3 ~，有效避免问题） 4.设置家的时候上一个家实体会死掉掉落物品，改为tp @e ~ ~-999 ~（成功） 5.使用各种蛋时tp @e ~ ~-999 ~，防止动物直接死亡，也避免了高频kill @e[type=]（成功） And 4 More...

replies.author: lzs1234
replies.txt_content: 告诉我你都开了创造还用这个干嘛。而且不能用刷怪蛋设置xyz还要自己改。最后这和随机传送有什么关系

本帖最后由 330032662 于 2015-8-13 19:46 编辑 

为什么不让玩家自己设置家？就是说给玩家一个刷怪蛋或盔甲架，让玩家把刷怪蛋或盔甲架放在家里，再用entitydata把玩家放的刷怪蛋或盔甲架一放出来就变隐形的，生物可以加一个NoAI,传送时把玩家tp到该实体。
